title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2014 Anarcoins "Unobtanium" silver bar #55**Only 1of 50 bars produced****Bar tests as pure silver even though the encyclopedia states that only #1-50 were to be pure silver**LOT 2: 2014 Anarcoins "Unobtanium" gold plated copper bar #195**Only 1 of 25 bars produced****Holograms are not included**STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 1st, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: PAYMENT: BTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qtsSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
